com.opentok
Class Subscriber

java.lang.Object
  com.opentok.Subscriber

public abstract class Subscriber
extends Object

Consumes audio and video of a publisher in the OpenTok session. Subscribers are created by passing a valid Stream instance into Session.createSubscriber(SurfaceView, Stream), and can connect to receive media with connect().

Nested Class Summary
static interface Subscriber.Listener
          Monitors state changes of a Subscriber instance.

Method Detail

connect

public void connect()
Connects this instance to the Stream used to create it. This call does not block, but there is a significant delay before success or failure of the action is determined. Use an instance of Subscriber.Listener to monitor the instance connectivity.

setListener

public void setListener(Subscriber.Listener listener)
Sets a listener to monitor state changes.

Parameters:
listener - The listener that monitors this Subscriber instance.
